Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • game2dai.entities.BaseEntity
      • game2dai.entities.Building
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<BaseEntity>

    public class Building
extends BaseEntity
    This class is used to represent a building.

    Peter Lager

      • Building

        public Building(Vector2D[] contour)
        Create a building with the given contour.
        Parameters:
        contour - open list (shape is automatically closed) of corners in counter-clockwise order

      • Building

        public Building(Vector2D offset,
        Vector2D[] contour)
        Create a building with the given contour.
        Parameters:
        offset - x/y to offset the contour data
        contour - open list (shape is automatically closed) of corners in counter-clockwise order

      • Building

        public Building(String name,
        Vector2D offset,
        Vector2D[] contour)
        Create a building with the given contour.
        Parameters:
        name - an optional name for the building
        offset - x/y to offset the contour data
        contour - open list (shape is automatically closed) of corners in counter-clockwise order
